name: Dr. Ananya Reddy
aboutDoctor: Dr. Ananya Reddy is a highly experienced cardiologist with 15 years of practice in treating heart conditions. She is known for her compassionate care.

name: Dr. Kiran Patel
aboutDoctor: Dr. Kiran Patel specializes in skin health and cosmetic treatments, offering advanced dermatological solutions to all age groups.

name: Dr. Meera Sharma
aboutDoctor: Dr. Meera Sharma treats disorders of the brain and nervous system, including epilepsy and migraines. She has over 12 years of experience.

name: Dr. Raghav Verma
aboutDoctor: Specializing in joint replacement and trauma care, Dr. Verma has helped thousands regain mobility and live pain-free.

name: Dr. Sneha Kapoor
aboutDoctor: Dr. Sneha Kapoor is dedicated to child health and wellness, focusing on immunizations, nutrition, and development.

name: Dr. Arjun Rao
aboutDoctor: Dr. Arjun Rao treats ear, nose, and throat conditions using advanced diagnostic techniques and patient-centered care.

name: Dr. Lakshmi Narayan
aboutDoctor: Dr. Lakshmi Narayan specializes in cancer treatment and is part of multiple national research programs for oncology breakthroughs.

name: Dr. Vivek Nair
aboutDoctor: Dr. Vivek Nair is a mental health specialist helping patients manage anxiety, depression, and emotional well-being.
